headline: Abrams returns to campaign trail as she begins second bid for governor
sentences:
The Biden administration has been facing low approval numbers amid omicron, inflation and key campaign priorities stalled in Congress, setting up a difficult political environment for Democrats in 2022.
I am a proud Democrat and President Joe Biden is my president,? she said.
